        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d"><!---->aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<!----></a><br>Author: yiyix <<span class="line"><!---->Author: yiyix &lt;<!----></span>yiyix@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yiyix@chromium.org"><!---->yiyix@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Thu Dec 17 21:10:46 2020<span class="line"><!---->Date: Thu Dec 17 21:10:46 2020<!----></span><br><br>Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<span class="line"><!---->Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<!----></span><br><br>After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<span class="line"><!---->After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<!----></span><br>trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<span class="line"><!---->trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<!----></span><br>HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<span class="line"><!---->HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<!----></span><br>canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<span class="line"><!---->canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<!----></span><br>as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<span class="line"><!---->as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<!----></span><br>provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<span class="line"><!---->provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<!----></span><br>to poison address.<span class="line"><!---->to poison address.<!----></span><br><br>In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<span class="line"><!---->In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<!----></span><br>DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<span class="line"><!---->DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<!----></span><br>the observer list.<span class="line"><!---->the observer list.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1158266<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1158266" title="uaf in  use-after-poison in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording(canvas_resource_host.cc)"><!---->Bug: 1158266<!----></a><br><br>Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<!----></span><br>Reviewed-on: <span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-on: <!----></span>https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2595734<a class="undefined" target="_blank"         The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a"><!---->64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<!----></a><br>Author: yiyix <<span class="line"><!---->Author: yiyix &lt;<!----></span>yiyix@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yiyix@chromium.org"><!---->yiyix@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Tue Dec 22 06:45:18 2020<span class="line"><!---->Date: Tue Dec 22 06:45:18 2020<!----></span><br><br>Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<span class="line"><!---->Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<!----></span><br><br>After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<span class="line"><!---->After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<!----></span><br>trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<span class="line"><!---->trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<!----></span><br>HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<span class="line"><!---->HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<!----></span><br>canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<span class="line"><!---->canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<!----></span><br>as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<span class="line"><!---->as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<!----></span><br>provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<span class="line"><!---->provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<!----></span><br>to poison address.<span class="line"><!---->to poison address.<!----></span><br><br>In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<span class="line"><!---->In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<!----></span><br>DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<span class="line"><!---->DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<!----></span><br>the observer list.<span class="line"><!---->the observer list.<!----></span><br><br>TBR=<span class="line"><!---->TBR=<!----></span>jbroman@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/jbroman@chromium.org"><!---->jbroman@chromium.org<!----></a><br><br>Bug: 1158266<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1158266" title="uaf in  use-after-poison in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording(canvas_resource_host.cc)"><!---->Bug: 1158266<!----></a><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank"         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        mr-issue-details {
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);

          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: flex-start;
          flex-direction: column;
          margin: 0;
          box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        h3 {
          margin-top: 1em;
        }
        mr-description {
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        mr-edit-issue {
          margin-top: 40px;
        }
      </style>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d"><!---->aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<!----></a><br>Author: yiyix <<span class="line"><!---->Author: yiyix &lt;<!----></span>yiyix@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yiyix@chromium.org"><!---->yiyix@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Thu Dec 17 21:10:46 2020<span class="line"><!---->Date: Thu Dec 17 21:10:46 2020<!----></span><br><br>Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<span class="line"><!---->Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<!----></span><br><br>After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<span class="line"><!---->After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<!----></span><br>trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<span class="line"><!---->trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<!----></span><br>HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<span class="line"><!---->HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<!----></span><br>canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<span class="line"><!---->canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<!----></span><br>as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<span class="line"><!---->as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<!----></span><br>provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<span class="line"><!---->provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<!----></span><br>to poison address.<span class="line"><!---->to poison address.<!----></span><br><br>In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<span class="line"><!---->In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<!----></span><br>DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<span class="line"><!---->DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<!----></span><br>the observer list.<span class="line"><!---->the observer list.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1158266<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1158266" title="uaf in  use-after-poison in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording(canvas_resource_host.cc)"><!---->Bug: 1158266<!----></a><br><br>Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<!----></span><br>Reviewed-on: <span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-on: <!----></span>https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2595734<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2595734"><!---->https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2595734<!----></a><br>Commit-Queue: Jeremy Roman <<span class="line"><!---->Commit-Queue: Jeremy Roman &lt;<!----></span>jbroman@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/jbroman@chromium.org"><!---->jbroman@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Commit-Queue: Yi Xu <<span class="line"><!---->Commit-Queue: Yi Xu &lt;<!----></span>yiyix@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yiyix@chromium.org"><!---->yiyix@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Reviewed-by: Jeremy Roman <<span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-by: Jeremy Roman &lt;<!----></span>jbroman@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/jbroman@chromium.org"><!---->jbroman@chromium.org<!----></a>><span         The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a"><!---->64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<!----></a><br>Author: yiyix <<span class="line"><!---->Author: yiyix &lt;<!----></span>yiyix@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yiyix@chromium.org"><!---->yiyix@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Tue Dec 22 06:45:18 2020<span class="line"><!---->Date: Tue Dec 22 06:45:18 2020<!----></span><br><br>Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<span class="line"><!---->Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<!----></span><br><br>After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<span class="line"><!---->After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<!----></span><br>trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<span class="line"><!---->trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<!----></span><br>HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<span class="line"><!---->HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<!----></span><br>canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<span class="line"><!---->canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<!----></span><br>as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<span class="line"><!---->as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<!----></span><br>provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<span class="line"><!---->provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<!----></span><br>to poison address.<span class="line"><!---->to poison address.<!----></span><br><br>In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<span class="line"><!---->In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<!----></span><br>DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<span class="line"><!---->DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<!----></span><br>the observer list.<span class="line"><!---->the observer list.<!----></span><br><br>TBR=<span class="line"><!---->TBR=<!----></span>jbroman@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/jbroman@chromium.org"><!---->jbroman@chromium.org<!----></a><br><br>Bug: 1158266<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1158266" title="uaf in  use-after-poison in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording(canvas_resource_host.cc)"><!---->Bug: 1158266<!----></a><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank" I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<!----></span><br>Reviewed-on: <span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-on:         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users.         Setting Pri-1 to match security severity High. If this is incorrect, please reset the priority. Sheriffbot won't make this change again.<!----></span><br><br>For more details visit <span class="line"><!---->For more details visit <!----></span>https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage"><!---->https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<!----></a> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<span class="line"><!----> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d"><!---->aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<!----></a><br>Author: yiyix <<span class="line"><!---->Author: yiyix &lt;<!----></span>yiyix@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yiyix@chromium.org"><!---->yiyix@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Thu Dec 17 21:10:46 2020<span class="line"><!---->Date: Thu Dec 17 21:10:46 2020<!----></span><br><br>Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<span class="line"><!---->Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<!----></span><br><br>After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<span class="line"><!---->After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<!----></span><br>trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<span class="line"><!---->trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<!----></span><br>HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<span class="line"><!---->HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<!----></span><br>canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<span class="line"><!---->canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<!----></span><br>as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<span class="line"><!---->as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<!----></span><br>provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<span class="line"><!---->provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<!----></span><br>to poison address.<span class="line"><!---->to poison address.<!----></span><br><br>In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<span class="line"><!---->In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<!----></span><br>DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<span class="line"><!---->DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<!----></span><br>the observer list.<span class="line"><!---->the observer list.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1158266<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1158266" title="uaf in  use-after-poison in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording(canvas_resource_host.cc)"><!---->Bug: 1158266<!----></a><br><br>Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<!----></span><br>Reviewed-on: <span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-on: <!----></span>https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2595734<a class="undefined" target="_blank"         The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a"><!---->64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<!----></a><br>Author: yiyix <<span class="line"><!---->Author: yiyix &lt;<!----></span>yiyix@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yiyix@chromium.org"><!---->yiyix@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Tue Dec 22 06:45:18 2020<span class="line"><!---->Date: Tue Dec 22 06:45:18 2020<!----></span><br><br>Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<span class="line"><!---->Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<!----></span><br><br>After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<span class="line"><!---->After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<!----></span><br>trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<span class="line"><!---->trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<!----></span><br>HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<span class="line"><!---->HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<!----></span><br>canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<span class="line"><!---->canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<!----></span><br>as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<span class="line"><!---->as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<!----></span><br>provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<span class="line"><!---->provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<!----></span><br>to poison address.<span class="line"><!---->to poison address.<!----></span><br><br>In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<span class="line"><!---->In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<!----></span><br>DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<span class="line"><!---->DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<!----></span><br>the observer list.<span class="line"><!---->the observer list.<!----></span><br><br>TBR=<span class="line"><!---->TBR=<!----></span>jbroman@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/jbroman@chromium.org"><!---->jbroman@chromium.org<!----></a><br><br>Bug: 1158266<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1158266" title="uaf in  use-after-poison in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording(canvas_resource_host.cc)"><!---->Bug: 1158266<!----></a><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank"         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d"><!---->aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<!----></a><br>Author: yiyix <<span class="line"><!---->Author: yiyix &lt;<!----></span>yiyix@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yiyix@chromium.org"><!---->yiyix@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Thu Dec 17 21:10:46 2020<span class="line"><!---->Date: Thu Dec 17 21:10:46 2020<!----></span><br><br>Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<span class="line"><!---->Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<!----></span><br><br>After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<span class="line"><!---->After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<!----></span><br>trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<span class="line"><!---->trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<!----></span><br>HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<span class="line"><!---->HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<!----></span><br>canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<span class="line"><!---->canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<!----></span><br>as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<span class="line"><!---->as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<!----></span><br>provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<span class="line"><!---->provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<!----></span><br>to poison address.<span class="line"><!---->to poison address.<!----></span><br><br>In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<span class="line"><!---->In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<!----></span><br>DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<span class="line"><!---->DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<!----></span><br>the observer list.<span class="line"><!---->the observer list.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1158266<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1158266" title="uaf in  use-after-poison in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording(canvas_resource_host.cc)"><!---->Bug: 1158266<!----></a><br><br>Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<!----></span><br>Reviewed-on: <span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-on: <!----></span>https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2595734<a class="undefined" target="_blank"         The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a"><!---->64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<!----></a><br>Author: yiyix <<span class="line"><!---->Author: yiyix &lt;<!----></span>yiyix@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yiyix@chromium.org"><!---->yiyix@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Tue Dec 22 06:45:18 2020<span class="line"><!---->Date: Tue Dec 22 06:45:18 2020<!----></span><br><br>Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<span class="line"><!---->Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<!----></span><br><br>After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<span class="line"><!---->After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<!----></span><br>trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<span class="line"><!---->trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<!----></span><br>HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<span class="line"><!---->HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<!----></span><br>canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<span class="line"><!---->canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<!----></span><br>as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<span class="line"><!---->as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<!----></span><br>provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<span class="line"><!---->provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<!----></span><br>to poison address.<span class="line"><!---->to poison address.<!----></span><br><br>In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<span class="line"><!---->In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<!----></span><br>DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<span class="line"><!---->DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<!----></span><br>the observer list.<span class="line"><!---->the observer list.<!----></span><br><br>TBR=<span class="line"><!---->TBR=<!----></span>jbroman@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/jbroman@chromium.org"><!---->jbroman@chromium.org<!----></a><br><br>Bug: 1158266<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1158266" title="uaf in  use-after-poison in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording(canvas_resource_host.cc)"><!---->Bug: 1158266<!----></a><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d"><!---->aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<!----></a>)<span class="line"><!---->)<!----></span><br><br>Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<!----></span><br>Reviewed-on: <span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-on: <!----></span>https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2595734<a class="undefined" target="_blank"         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d"><!---->aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<!----></a><br>Author: yiyix <<span class="line"><!---->Author: yiyix &lt;<!----></span>yiyix@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yiyix@chromium.org"><!---->yiyix@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Thu Dec 17 21:10:46 2020<span class="line"><!---->Date: Thu Dec 17 21:10:46 2020<!----></span><br><br>Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<span class="line"><!---->Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<!----></span><br><br>After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<span class="line"><!---->After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<!----></span><br>trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<span class="line"><!---->trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<!----></span><br>HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<span class="line"><!---->HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<!----></span><br>canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<span class="line"><!---->canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<!----></span><br>as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<span class="line"><!---->as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<!----></span><br>provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<span class="line"><!---->provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<!----></span><br>to poison address.<span class="line"><!---->to poison address.<!----></span><br><br>In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<span class="line"><!---->In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<!----></span><br>DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<span class="line"><!---->DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<!----></span><br>the observer list.<span class="line"><!---->the observer list.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1158266<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1158266" title="uaf in  use-after-poison in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording(canvas_resource_host.cc)"><!---->Bug: 1158266<!----></a><br><br>Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<!----></span><br>Reviewed-on: <span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-on: <!----></span>https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2595734<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2595734"><!---->https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2595734<!----></a><br>Commit-Queue: Jeremy Roman <<span class="line"><!---->Commit-Queue: Jeremy Roman &lt;<!----></span>jbroman@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/jbroman@chromium.org"><!---->jbroman@chromium.org<!----></a>><span         The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a"><!---->64cdb99ce66bcb3919eb981d432b9eac06c4eb0a<!----></a><br>Author: yiyix <<span class="line"><!---->Author: yiyix &lt;<!----></span>yiyix@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yiyix@chromium.org"><!---->yiyix@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Tue Dec 22 06:45:18 2020<span class="line"><!---->Date: Tue Dec 22 06:45:18 2020<!----></span><br><br>Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<span class="line"><!---->Fix poison address in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording<!----></span><br><br>After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<span class="line"><!---->After allocate a large buffer in memory and creating canvas, it will<!----></span><br>trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<span class="line"><!---->trigger the garbage collection from v8, which will trigger<!----></span><br>HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<span class="line"><!---->HtmlCanvasElement::Dispose to be called. This call will cause the<!----></span><br>canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<span class="line"><!---->canvas element detached from the |host|. However the |host| is saved<!----></span><br>as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<span class="line"><!---->as a valid callback in the observer list of the canvas resource<!----></span><br>provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<span class="line"><!---->provider. Calling this |host| without canvas element causes this access<!----></span><br>to poison address.<span class="line"><!---->to poison address.<!----></span><br><br>In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<span class="line"><!---->In my fix, after garbage collection is triggered and dispose is called,<!----></span><br>DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<span class="line"><!---->DiscardResourceProvider() is called as well, so it removes itself from<!----></span><br>the observer list.<span class="line"><!---->the observer list.<!----></span><br><br>TBR=<span class="line"><!---->TBR=<!----></span>jbroman@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/jbroman@chromium.org"><!---->jbroman@chromium.org<!----></a><br><br>Bug: 1158266<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1158266" title="uaf in  use-after-poison in blink::CanvasResourceHost::InitializeForRecording(canvas_resource_host.cc)"><!---->Bug: 1158266<!----></a><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d"><!---->aedd4d97491936c57c45552dfeb8ea6ea985d26d<!----></a>)<span class="line"><!---->)<!----></span><br><br>Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id: I40bfc24ff5dcdb7a248114220100b6dd54ac06f4<!----></span><br>Reviewed-on: <span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-on: <!----></span>https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2595734<a class="undefined" target="_blank"         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

       Note: Avoiding 2-way data binding to futureproof this code
        for LitElement. 
      <input id="checkbox" type="checkbox">
      
        <slot></slot>
      <label for="checkbox">
        <slot></slot>
      </label>

            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

        for LitElement.

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
